California: BANC - Balancing Authority of Northern California,CISO - California Independent System Operator,IID - Imperial Irrigation District,LDWP - Los Angeles Department of Water and Power,TIDC - Turlock Irrigation District
Midwest: AECI - Associated Electric Cooperative, Inc.,EEI - Electric Energy, Inc.,GLHB - GridLiance,LGEE - Louisville Gas and Electric Company and Kentucky Utilities Company,MISO - Midcontinent Independent System Operator, Inc.
